original_text: So each of them took his censer, put burning coals and incense in it, and stood with Moses and Aaron at the entrance to the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 그들이 제각기 향로를 가져다가 불을 담고 향을 그 위에 얹고 모세와 아론과 더불어 회막 문에 서니라

sentences.original_text: So each of them took his censer
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들 각자는 자기의 향로를 들고

sentences.original_text: put burning coals and incense in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 타는 숯과 향을 넣고

sentences.original_text: and stood with Moses and Aaron
at the entrance to the tent of meeting
